s.text: Both the LAT and NYT report that the minority drop occurred despite the university's decision to give extra consideration to poor applicants, thus proving that in California at least, class isn't race.
One university official is quoted by the LAT as seeing in the shift the message that California's secondary schools must improve, while the paper has Prop.
But the paper goes on to note that the study was sponsored by Redux's manufacturer and does not in any case address the consequences of long-term use.

Both the LAT and NYT go front-page with the news that an eleven-year-old girl, Emily Rosa, did research for a science fair two years ago as a fourth-grader that is being published today in the prestigious Journal of the American Medical Association.
